workshoptitle: Get started with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Forecasting

tutorials.title: Introduction: Forecasting Service
tutorials.description: Learn how to build anomaly detection model and use it for detection

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Sign up for and log into the Oracle Cloud

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Set up Data Science Notebook
tutorials.description: Learn what data and format needed for training, and use the prepared sample data for nex steps.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Understand Data, Download Samples, Prepare data, Create Project
tutorials.description: Learn how to create Forecast project

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Train Model and Forecast
tutorials.description: Learn how to create data asset, build and deploy model, and perform Forecasting

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Generate Model Explainability
tutorials.description: Learn how to generate Explainability for model used for Forecasting

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
